column4: will I be able to upgrade from Dapper to Hardy ?  LTS -> LTS ?
oh, i thought there was an LTS -> LTS upgrade path
what about servers where you only want to run LTS?  reinstall ?
what do u wanna tell me?
it looks like it is in planning
it's a blueprint, havent been implemented yet
yes.  Now instead of saying "no you can't" you can tell people that it will hopefully be supported in the future
if u think u r misinformed by me, im sorry
however i won't change my answer for that question unless it's official confirmed
